ja501:20.1: Kathaṃ tvaṃ pamokkho → kathaṃ pamokkho (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | kathaṃ te pamokkho (?)
ja501:26.3: Abajjhi taṃ → abajjhi tañca (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | abajjhi ta (sya2ed)
ja501:31.4: umāpupphasarinnibhaṃ → ummāpupphasirinibhaṃ (bj) | ummāpupphasirinnibhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
ja501:33.1: Kasivāṇijjā → kasī vaṇijjā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | kasivaṇijjā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
